author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anchor Group Says ‍FY Adjusted HEPS Down 41 Pct​
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Anchor Group Ltd:
* ‍FY ADJUSTED HEPS DOWN 41% TO 38 CENTS PER SHARE (64.7 CENTS TO 31 DECEMBER 2016)​
* ‍FY ADJUSTED HEADLINE EARNINGS DOWN 36% TO R73.8 MILLION (R115.2 MILLION TO 31 DECEMBER 2016)​
* ‍FINAL DIVIDEND OF 10 CENTS (15 CENTS IN 2016)​ * ‍ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AND ADVICE GREW 14% DURING 2017 TO R52.3 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
